name: Ayoka Flowers
description: Retailer for sending flowers to India
overview:
Ayoka flowers is online retailer for sending flowers and gift to your loved ones across India.

With stores in Bangalore (Bengaluru), Kolkata, and a network of florists across the country, Ayoka flowers specializes in delivering flowers across more than 150 cities in India.

Ayoka flowers also lets customers customize the flower arrangement to suit their needs. Ayoka flowers is flexible with respect to flower delivery. You can get your flowers delivered at place and time of your choice.

Customers can follow us on facebook at www.facebook.com/ayokaflower. Our twitter handle is “ayokaflowers”
